pr_title: HBASE-23621 Reduced the number of Checkstyle violations in tests of hbase-common

timeline.message: HBASE-23621 Reduced the number of Checkstyle violations in tests of hbase-common
HBASE-23621 Reduced the number of Checkstyle violations in tests of hbase-common

timeline.bodyText: this is a file header and not a javadoc, shouldn't it be using /* and not /**?
timeline.author: busbey
timeline.diffHunk:

- * "License"); you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
- * You may obtain a copy of the License at
+/**
